thread.title: The worst hotel I have ever seen
thread.title_full: The worst hotel I have ever seen - Review of Holiday Inn Express London City, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andr√°s A
title: The worst hotel I have ever seen
text:
The hotel is awful. The breakfast is disgusting and the cutlery is dirty. I've found chocolate on the spoons, far on the knife and fried eggs on the forks. I was woke up in the morning by bed bugs.
There is no ventilation in the bathroom. Steam everywhere.
It was a terrible 3 night stand. Avoid this place.
